mapper.select: SELECT t_student.pid, t_student.sno, t_student.sname, t_student.ssex, t_student.instructorid, t_student.imgurl, t_user.realname as instructorname, t_student.sphone, t_student.index FROM t_student left join t_user on t_student.instructorid = t_user.pid

SELECT t_student.pid, t_student.sno, t_student.sname, t_student.ssex, t_student.instructorid, t_student.imgurl, t_user.realname as instructorname, t_student.sphone, t_student.index FROM t_student left join t_user on t_student.instructorid = t_user.pid WHERE t_student.instructorid = #{pid}

SELECT t_student.pid, t_student.sno, t_student.sname, t_student.ssex, t_student.instructorid, t_student.imgurl, t_user.realname, t_user.realname as instructorname, t_student.sphone, t_student.index FROM t_student left join t_user on t_student.instructorid = t_user.pid WHERE t_student.sno = #{sno}

SELECT t_student.pid, t_student.sno, t_student.sname, t_student.ssex, t_student.instructorid, t_student.imgurl, t_user.realname as instructorname, t_student.sphone, t_student.index FROM t_student left join t_user on t_student.instructorid = t_user.pid WHERE t_student.sno = #{sno} AND t_student.instructorid = #{instructorid}

SELECT t_dormitory.pid, t_dormitory.dormitorycode, t_dormitory.buildno, t_dormitory.layerno, t_dormitory.roomno, t_dormitory.bedno, t_dormitory.bedstatus FROM t_dormitory WHERE t_dormitory.bedstatus != '已入住'
SELECT t_user.pid, t_user.realname, t_user.role FROM t_user WHERE t_user.role = '辅导员'
